isis.stitle: CAB - MXT - Windshield Washer Reservoir and/or Pump Motor - Installation

svcproc.title: Installation
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 7 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install reservoir (Item 3) on reservoir bracket (Item 9) and secure with four bolts (Item 8) and four nuts (Item 7).
Install fill tube (Item 5) to reservoir (Item 3) and tighten clamp (Item 6).
Install washer fluid supply hose (Item 1) to pump motor (Item 10).
Connect electrical connector (Item 2) to pump motor (Item 10).

note.para: Do not attempt to fill the reservoir by removing the cap at the top of the reservoir. It is difficult to remove the cap at that location and you may damage the reservoir. Use the remote fill located in the engine compartment.

step1.para: Fill reservoir with Windshield washer solvent at the remote fill location located in the engine compartment and check for leaks and proper system operation.
